content: @Ashley Mannix Continuing the discussion from rust-lang/rust-forge#392 what would you think of having a libs-teamrepo that has a issue or topic for each of the repos, and could act as a place for meta discussion of that crate? Kind of like how the compiler team uses their issues on the team repo. https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/issues

I would love to set up a libs repo, and covet the compiler teamâ€™s website ðŸ‘€ Iâ€™ve been trying to flesh out our libs docs on the forge to the point that we could have enough to bootstrap a dedicated repo

Well the compiler team repo is using Hugo, if you just wanted to use mdbook I have already built a template repository for project groups that would work just as well for teams. https://github.com/rust-lang/project-group-template
Thanks @XAMPPRocky :bow: I'll check it out
